name: Keto Omelet (Indian Style)

publisher.name: Headbanger's Kitchen - Keto All The Way!
publisher.description: Your one-stop resource for the best low carb and keto recipes on the internet. Make keto tasty again! Plus: Vlogs, blogs and just enough jibber jabber.

recipeIngredient: 1 Tbsp Heavy Whipping Cream Order online
1/2 Tsp Kashmiri Red Chilli Powder Order online

recipeInstructions.text: Crack the 3 eggs into a bowl and add in the chopped onion, coriander, salt, pepper, tumeric, chilli powder and heavy cream and beat well.
Heat the ghee in a frying pan and once melted add in the beaten eggs. Grate in the cheese and cover and cook for about 4 minutes. Fold the egg and finish cooking.
Serve with a side of salad.
